mapper.insert: insert into `invoiceinfo` (userId, title, contact, phone, address, zip, invoiceRequest, comment) values (#{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contact,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{zip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{invoiceRequest,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{comment,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update `invoiceinfo` set userId = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, contact = #{contact,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, zip = #{zip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, invoiceRequest = #{invoiceRequest,jdbcType=TINYINT}, comment = #{comment,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, userId, title, contact, phone, address, zip, invoiceRequest, comment from `invoiceinfo`
